== Fix validation tracking ==

Test the changes that were introduced after the archive freeze to verify the fixes work and that they don't break surrounding functionality. Ideally these should be tested by a person different from the person who fixed (and presumably tested) the bug and on a fresh install where applicable. 

''Post bug numbers for all the changes that were introduced since the archive froze for this milestone.''
